title: 15 Die In Fresh Zamfara Attack – Police – Channels Television
content: Fifteen people were killed on Saturday after gunmen invaded Zakuna village in Anka Local Government area of Zamfara State.   Public Relations Officer of the Zamfara State Police Command, DSP Muhammad Shehu, told Channels Television that at least 15 people were confirmed dead. “On receiving the …     Read more via Channels Television – https://ift.tt/2xIc7Mu   Get More Nigeria Metro News
